message.name: ERR_PROSPECT_PERSON_SSN_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A Participant with Reference Number "%1s" already exists.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECT_PERSON_PRIMARY_ADDRESS_STREET1_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: You must enter the Prospect Person's Primary Address

message.name: ERR_PUBLIC_OFFICE_CANCELED
message.locale: A public office with status of 'Canceled' cannot be selected.
A public office with status of 'Cancelled' cannot be selected.

message.name: ERR_PUBLIC_OFFICE_CLOSED
message.locale: A public office with office status of 'Closed' cannot be selected.

message.name: ERR_AGE_RANGE_INCORRECT
message.locale: The Estimated From Age must be lesser than or equal to the Estimated To Age.

message.name: ERR_REFERENCE_NUM_ALREADY_EXISTS_AS_PRIMARY_ALT_ID
message.locale: This reference number is already used as a primary alternative ID for another client.

message.name: ERR_XFV_INDIGENOUS_PROSPECT_PERSON_INDICATOR_CHECK
message.locale: The indigenous prospect person must be selected, if indigenous region/group details are entered

message.name: INF_XFV_INDIGENOUS_PROSPECT_PERSON_INDICATOR_SELECTED_CHECK
message.locale: The prospect person has been identified as an indigenous individual. Please select the appropriate indigenous group(s) when known.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PROSPECT_PERSON_REGISTERED_AS_PERSON
message.locale: The prospect person has been registered as person "%1s".

message.name: ERR_PROSPECT_PERSON_RNFE
message.locale: The prospect person cannot be found.

message.name: ERR_FV_PROSPECT_PERSON_ESTIMATED_FROM_AGE_MUST_BE_A_WHOLE_NUMBER
message.locale: The field 'Estimated From Age' must be a whole number.

message.name: ERR_FV_PROSPECT_PERSON_ESTIMATED_TO_AGE_MUST_BE_A_WHOLE_NUMBER
message.locale: The field 'Estimated To Age' must be a whole number.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PROSPECT_PERSON_ESTIMATED_TO_AGE_MUST_BE_ENTERED_IF_ESTIMATED_FROM_AGE_IS_ENTERED
message.locale: Estimated To Age must be entered if Estimated From Age is entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PROSPECT_PERSON_ESTIMATED_FROM_AGE_MUST_BE_ENTERED_IF_ESTIMATED_TO_AGE_IS_ENTERED
message.locale: Estimated From Age must be entered if Estimated To Age is entered.
